title: Definitions: Other Properties.
description: Schemas in #/definitions detect or validate keys, objects or constraints variously applicable to Annotations, Bodies, Targets, Specific Resources, Textual Bodies, Items, and/or Sources (Section 3.3).

createdValidIfPresent.title: Validation: created value
createdValidIfPresent.description: True when the object being tested (annotation, body, target...) has no created or has a single created of format date-time (Section 3.3.1)

createdPropertyFound.title: Collate: created key with qualifying body/target classes
createdPropertyFound.description: Supports implementation check of created (if/when) used on External Web Resources, Specific Resources, Textual Body Resources (Sections 3.2.1-6, 3.3)

itemCreatedPropertyFound.title: Collate: items having created key with qualifying body/target classes
itemCreatedPropertyFound.description: Supports implementation check of items having created (if/when) used on External Web Resources, Specific Resources, Textual Body Resources (Sections 3.2.1-6, 3.3)

sourceCreatedPropertyFound.title: Collate: Specific Resource source having created key
sourceCreatedPropertyFound.description: Supports implementation check of created (if/when) used on Specific Resource source (Sections 3.2.1-6, 3.3)

generatedValidIfPresent.title: Validation: generated value
generatedValidIfPresent.description: True when the annotation, body or target has no generated or has a single generated of format date-time (Section 3.3.1)

generatedPropertyFound.title: Collate: generated key with qualifying body/target classes
generatedPropertyFound.description: Supports implementation check of generated (if/when) used on External Web Resources, Specific Resources, Textual Body Resources (Sections 3.2.1-6, 3.3)

modifiedValidIfPresent.title: Validation: modified value
modifiedValidIfPresent.description: True when the annotation, body or target has no modified or has a single modified of format date-time (Section 3.3.1)

modifiedPropertyFound.title: Collate: modified key with qualifying body/target classes
modifiedPropertyFound.description: Supports implementation check of modified (if/when) used on External Web Resources, Specific Resources, Textual Body Resources (Sections 3.2.1-6, 3.3)

itemModifiedPropertyFound.title: Collate: items having modified key with qualifying body/target classes
itemModifiedPropertyFound.description: Supports implementation check of items having modified (if/when) used on External Web Resources, Specific Resources, Textual Body Resources (Sections 3.2.1-6, 3.3)

sourceModifiedPropertyFound.title: Collate: Specific Resource source having modified key
sourceModifiedPropertyFound.description: Supports implementation check of modified (if/when) used on Specific Resource source (Sections 3.2.1-6, 3.3)

creatorValidIfPresent.title: Validation: creator value
creatorValidIfPresent.description: True when the annotation, body or target has one or more creators (Section 3.3.1)

creatorSingularIfPresent.title: Validation: creator value
creatorSingularIfPresent.description: True when the annotation, body or target has exactly 1 creator (Section 3.3.1)

creatorPropertyFound.title: Collate: creator key with qualifying body/target classes
creatorPropertyFound.description: Supports implementation check of creator (if/when) used on External Web Resources, Specific Resources, Textual Body Resources (Section 3.3.1)

itemCreatorPropertyFound.title: Collate: items having creator key with qualifying body/target classes
itemCreatorPropertyFound.description: Supports implementation check of items having creator (if/when) used on External Web Resources, Specific Resources, Textual Body Resources (Sections 3.2.1-6, 3.3)

sourceCreatorPropertyFound.title: Collate: Specific Resource source having creator key
sourceCreatorPropertyFound.description: Supports implementation check of creator (if/when) used on Specific Resource source (Sections 3.2.1-6, 3.3)

singleCreatorPropertyFound.title: Collate: creator key with qualifying body/target classes
singleCreatorPropertyFound.description: Supports implementation check of creator being singular (if/when) used on External Web Resources, Specific Resources, Textual Body Resources (Section 3.3.1)

itemSingleCreatorPropertyFound.title: Collate: items having singular creator key with qualifying body/target classes
itemSingleCreatorPropertyFound.description: Supports implementation check of items having singular creator (if/when) used on External Web Resources, Specific Resources, Textual Body Resources (Sections 3.2.1-6, 3.3)

sourceSingleCreatorPropertyFound.title: Collate: Specific Resource source having singular creator key
sourceSingleCreatorPropertyFound.description: Supports implementation check of singular creator (if/when) used on Specific Resource source (Sections 3.2.1-6, 3.3)

generatorValidIfPresent.title: Validation: generator value
generatorValidIfPresent.description: True when the annotation, body or target has a single generator (Section 3.3.1)

generatorPropertyFound.title: Collate: generator key with qualifying body/target classes
generatorPropertyFound.description: Supports implementation check of generator (if/when) used on External Web Resources, Specific Resources, Textual Body Resources (Section 3.3.1)

audienceDefinition.title: Definition: audience object
audienceDefinition.description: True when object meets our requirements for audience value (Section 3.3.3)

audienceValidIfPresent.title: Validation: audience value
audienceValidIfPresent.description: True when no audience or audience property of the annotation, body, target, ... is valid (Section 3.3.3)

audiencePropertyFound.title: Collate: audience key with qualifying body/target classes
audiencePropertyFound.description: Supports implementation check of audience (if/when) used on Annotation, External Web Resources, Specific Resources, Textual Body Resources (Section 3.3.3)

itemAudiencePropertyFound.title: Collate: items having audience key with qualifying body/target classes
itemAudiencePropertyFound.description: Supports implementation check of items having audience (if/when) used on External Web Resources, Specific Resources, Textual Body Resources (Sections 3.2.1-6, 3.3)

sourceAudiencePropertyFound.title: Collate: Specific Resource source having audience key
sourceAudiencePropertyFound.description: Supports implementation check of audience (if/when) used on Specific Resource source (Sections 3.2.1-6, 3.3)

accessibilityValidIfPresent.title: Validation: accessibility value
accessibilityValidIfPresent.description: True when no accessibility or accessibility property of the body, target, ... is valid (Section 3.3.4)

accessibilityPropertyFound.title: Collate: accessibility key with qualifying body/target classes
accessibilityPropertyFound.description: Supports implementation check of accessibility (if/when) used on External Web Resources, Specific Resources, Textual Body Resources (Section 3.3.4)

itemAccessibilityPropertyFound.title: Collate: items having accessibility key with qualifying body/target classes
itemAccessibilityPropertyFound.description: Supports implementation check of items having accessibility (if/when) used on External Web Resources, Specific Resources, Textual Body Resources (Sections 3.2.1-6, 3.3)

sourceAccessibilityPropertyFound.title: Collate: Specific Resource source having audience key
sourceAccessibilityPropertyFound.description: Supports implementation check of audience (if/when) used on Specific Resource source (Sections 3.2.1-6, 3.3)

rightsValidIfPresent.title: Validation: rights value
rightsValidIfPresent.description: True when the annotation, body or target has 0 or more rights properties that are strings of format uri (Section 3.3.6)

rightsPropertyFound.title: Collate: rights key with qualifying annotation/body/target classes
rightsPropertyFound.description: Supports implementation check of rights (if/when) used on Annotation, External Web Resources, Specific Resources, Textual Body Resources (Sections 3.3.6)

itemRightsPropertyFound.title: Collate: items having rights key with qualifying body/target classes
itemRightsPropertyFound.description: Supports implementation check of items having rights (if/when) used on External Web Resources, Specific Resources, Textual Body Resources (Sections 3.2.1-6, 3.3)

sourceRightsPropertyFound.title: Collate: Specific Resource source having rights key
sourceRightsPropertyFound.description: Supports implementation check of rights (if/when) used on Specific Resource source (Sections 3.2.1-6, 3.3)

canonicalValidIfPresent.title: Validation: canonical value
canonicalValidIfPresent.description: True when the annotation, body or target has 0 or 1 canonical properties that are strings of format uri (Section 3.3.7)

canonicalPropertyFound.title: Collate: canonical key with qualifying annotation/body/target classes
canonicalPropertyFound.description: Supports implementation check of canonical (if/when) used on Annotation, External Web Resources, Specific Resources, Textual Body Resources (Sections 3.3.7)

itemCanonicalPropertyFound.title: Collate: items having canonical key with qualifying body/target classes
itemCanonicalPropertyFound.description: Supports implementation check of items having canonical (if/when) used on External Web Resources, Specific Resources, Textual Body Resources (Sections 3.2.1-6, 3.3)

sourceCanonicalPropertyFound.title: Collate: Specific Resource source having canonical key
sourceCanonicalPropertyFound.description: Supports implementation check of canonical (if/when) used on Specific Resource source (Sections 3.2.1-6, 3.3)

viaValidIfPresent.title: Validation: via value
viaValidIfPresent.description: True when the annotation, body or target has 0 or more via properties that are strings of format uri (Section 3.3.7)

viaPropertyFound.title: Collate: via key with qualifying annotation/body/target classes
viaPropertyFound.description: Supports implementation check of via (if/when) used on Annotation, External Web Resources, Specific Resources, Textual Body Resources (Sections 3.3.7)

itemViaPropertyFound.title: Collate: items having via key with qualifying body/target classes
itemViaPropertyFound.description: Supports implementation check of items having via (if/when) used on External Web Resources, Specific Resources, Textual Body Resources (Sections 3.2.1-6, 3.3)

sourceViaPropertyFound.title: Collate: Specific Resource source having via key
sourceViaPropertyFound.description: Supports implementation check of via (if/when) used on Specific Resource source (Sections 3.2.1-6, 3.3)

purposeRecognizedIfPresent.title: Validation: purpose value
purposeRecognizedIfPresent.description: True when the body has 0 or more purpose property values (Section 3.3.5)

purposePropertyFound.title: Collate: purpose key with qualifying body classes
purposePropertyFound.description: Supports implementation check of purpose (if/when) used on Specific Resource Body or Textual Body (Sections 3.3.5)

itemPurposePropertyFound.title: Collate: items having purpose key with qualifying body/target classes
itemPurposePropertyFound.description: Supports implementation check of items having purpose (if/when) used on Specific Resources, Textual Body Resources (Sections 3.2.1-6, 3.3)

agentTypeDefinition.title: Definition: Agent type value
agentTypeDefinition.description: True when the object (creator or generator agent) has no type or has at least one recognized Agent type value (Section 3.3.2)

agentTypeFound.title: Check for implementation of Agent type value
agentTypeFound.description: True when the object (creator or generator agent) has at least one recognized Agent type value (Section 3.3.2)

agentNameDefinition.title: Definition: Agent name value
agentNameDefinition.description: True when the object (creator or generator agent) has no name or has Agent name(s) of type string (Section 3.3.2)

agentSingularNameDefinition.title: Definition: Agent name value
agentSingularNameDefinition.description: True when the object (creator or generator agent) has no name or has exactly one Agent name that is a string (Section 3.3.2)

agentNameFound.title: Check for implementation of Agent name value
agentNameFound.description: True when the object (creator or generator agent) has Agent name value(s) (Section 3.3.2)

agentSingularNameFound.title: Check for implementation of Agent name value
agentSingularNameFound.description: True when the object (creator or generator agent) has exactly one Agent name value (Section 3.3.2)

agentSingularNicknameDefinition.title: Definition: Agent nickname value
agentSingularNicknameDefinition.description: True when the object (creator or generator agent) has no nickname or has exacly one Agent nickname that is a string (Section 3.3.2)

agentSingularNicknameFound.title: Check for implementation of Agent nickname value
agentSingularNicknameFound.description: True when the object (creator or generator agent) has an Agent nickname value (Section 3.3.2)

agentEmailDefinition.title: Definition: Agent email value
agentEmailDefinition.description: True when the object (creator or generator agent) has no email or has Agent one or more email addresses that start(s) mailto: and is format uri (Section 3.3.2)

agentEmailFound.title: Check for implementation of Agent email value
agentEmailFound.description: True when the object (creator or generator agent) has Agent email value(s) (Section 3.3.2)

agentEmail_sha1Definition.title: Definition: Agent email_sha1 value
agentEmail_sha1Definition.description: True when the object (creator or generator agent) has no email_sha1 or has one or more email_sha1 that is/are a string (Section 3.3.2)

agentEmail_sha1Found.title: Check for implementation of Agent email_sha1 value
agentEmail_sha1Found.description: True when the object (creator or generator agent) has has one or more email_sha1 that is/are a string (Section 3.3.2)

agentHomepageDefinition.title: Definition: Agent homepage value
agentHomepageDefinition.description: True when the object (creator or generator agent) has no homempage or has one or more agent homepage addresses of format uri (Section 3.3.2)

agentHomepageFound.title: Check for implementation of Agent homepage value
agentHomepageFound.description: True when the object (creator or generator agent) has Agent homepage value(s) (Section 3.3.2)
